title: NFL ATL: Stick a Fork
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Stick a Fork
description:
A room full of heroes, Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus, and Marc Sessler bring you the latest headlines from around the league and add two unlucky teams to the fork club. The gang also gives you their NFL pleasant surprises in honor of Turkey Day. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
